content:
That's a good start! Buying vegetables and proteins is a great foundation for many dishes. And chicken is a versatile ingredient that can be used in a variety of recipes.

Let's try to brainstorm together. What type of vegetables did you buy? Were they leafy greens, root vegetables, bell peppers, onions, or something else?

And what type of protein did you buy with the chicken? Was it boneless breasts, thighs, wings, or a combination?

Any details you can provide might help trigger your memory about what you were planning to make.

(And if you're still stuck, we can play a game of "culinary guessing" to try to figure it out!)
